text.text: If you have managed to achieve good inbox delivery rate but the response rate of your campaigns continue to suffer, you most probably have been sending randomized content without caring much about the sort of your recipients. Use segmentation to create more targeted groups of contacts with similar characteristics or behavioral pattern. MumaraClassic has combined all useful filters to turn unclassified lists into targeted subsets of contacts.

This premier tool would help you apply wide-raging filters to separate out specific number of records, and then take appropriate course of action, i.e. sending a new campaign to these segmented records or exporting a .CSV file of filtered records etc. You can select multiple lists and can apply various types of filters to create most targeted subsets.
